hymn.title: If you're happy and you know it

layout.singingstanza: If you're hap -- py and you know it, Clap your hands. If you're hap -- py and you know it, Clap your hands. If you're hap -- py and you know it, And you real -- ly want to show it, If you're hap -- py and you know it, Clap your hands.

lyrics.stanza: If you're happy and you know it, Clap your hands. If you're happy and you know it, Clap your hands. If you're happy and you know it, And you really want to show it, If you're happy and you know it, Clap your hands.
If you're happy and you know it, Stomp your feet. (stomp, stomp)
If you're happy and you know it, Call, "Oh, Lord". (Oh, Lord)
If you're happy and you know it, Say, "Amen". (Amen)
If you're happy and you know it, Do all four. (clap, clap; stomp, stomp; Oh, Lord; Amen.)
